content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 stone, bringing my inventory to 10 wood, 10 stone, and 10 iron ore.
# Now that I have enough materials, I can craft a stone furnace.

# I will proceed to craft the stone furnace.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)

# After crafting, I will check the updated inventory to ensure that the stone furnace has been created.
print(f"Inventory after crafting stone furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")
